actions.text: Amendment SA 2499 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Amendment SA 2499 proposed by Senator Warner to Amendment SA 1396. (consideration: CR S12589-12595; text: CR S12593) To make a technical correction.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2499 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2499 proposed by Senator Warner to Amendment SA 1396.

amends_amendment.purpose: To authorize $5,500,000 for military construction for the Army for the construction of a rotary wing landing pad at Fort Wainwright, Alaska, and to provide an offset of $8,000,000 by canceling a military construction project for the construction of an F-15E flight simulator facility at Elmendorf Air Force Base, Alaska.
